scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./src/config/ node -r dotenv/config -r module-alias/register -r esm ./node_modules/.bin/jest . dotenv_config_path=.env.test --config=jest.config.json
scripts.test:focused: NODE_ENV=test NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./src/config/ node -r dotenv/config -r module-alias/register -r esm ./node_modules/.bin/jest test/specs/unit/lib/search/summary/SummaryBuilder.spec.js dotenv_config_path=.env.test --config=jest.config.json
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=production NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./src/config/ node -r dotenv/config -r module-alias/register -r esm src/server.js
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development NODE_CONFIG_DIR=./src/config/ nodemon --watch src --exec 'node -r dotenv/config -r module-alias/register -r esm src/server.js'
